title: Taro Koki (Best Motoring, GT Channel)

itunes:title: Taro Koki (Best Motoring, GT Channel)
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary: Taro is one of the great minds behind GT Channel, one of the original and best automotive media channels on the internet. He's also one of the brains behind Best Motoring, easily one of the greatest tv shows in automotive history. It was the only place you could see press cars raced wheel to wheel. Find it, and watch it
itunes:subtitle: Taro is one of the great minds behind GT Channel, one of the original and best automotive media channels on the internet. He's also one of the brains behind Best Motoring, easily one of the greatest tv shows in automotive history. It was the only place you could see press cars raced wheel to wheel. Find it, and watch it
